typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	date as string ('1899-01-01 00:00:00.000')
}
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_date as string,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		scheduled_departure as string,
		scheduled_arrival as string,
		estimated_departure as string,
		estimated_arrival as string,
		actual_oooi_out as string,
		actual_oooi_off as string,
		actual_oooi_on as string,
		actual_oooi_in as string,
		base_airport as string,
		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,
		actual_departure_airport as string,
		actual_arrival_airport as string,
		is_verified as boolean,
		notes as string,
		is_canceled as boolean,
		flight_type as string,
		cargo_weight as string,
		fuel_out as string,
		fuel_in as string,
		fuel_uplift as string,
		maint_log_page as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> FlightsBlob
source(output(
		delay_code as string,
		delay_code_name as string,
		delay_type as string,
		duration_mins as short,
		flight_id as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> FlightsDelayBlob
FilterByDate derive(ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id,
		ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddADFColumns
JoinTables filter(toDate(updated_at)  > toDate($date)) ~> FilterByDate
FlightsBlob, FlightsDelayBlob join(FlightsBlob@flight_id == toString(FlightsDelayBlob@flight_id) ,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTables
AddADFColumns sink(input(
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_LAT as double,
		ARPT_LONG as double,
		ARPT_ALTD as integer,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as double,
		ARPT_DST as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		LAST_UPDT_DT as date,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ARPT_NAME,
		ARPT_CITY,
		ARPT_CNTRY,
		ARPT_IATA_CD,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD,
		ARPT_LAT,
		ARPT_LONG,
		ARPT_ALTD,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET,
		ARPT_DST,
		ARPT_TZONE,
		LAST_UPDT_DT,
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		ADF_TIME_STMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> StgAirports
